                        boolean replace)
                 throws MissingParameterException,
                        java.io.IOException
        Deprecated. 
        Encrypt a file.
        Parameters:
        file - The file to encrypt
        replace - True - Replace the specified file with the encrypted version. False - Keep the unencrypted file.

        Deprecated.
